bug.author: Hiddenfire21
bug.summary: Uploading of annotations results in all frames being keyframes
bug.description: Annotations dumped in CVAT XML 1.1 for videos and uploaded for a similar task. However after uploading all frames are keyframes even though XML has information on which frames should be keyframes. This makes it tedious to make changes to a track as each frame has to be edited

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/azhavoro>@azhavoro</denchmark-link> , need to investigate. If both tasks are in interpolation mode and dumped annotations for videos it is a bug.
